blog-single.quote: We had hughesnet for ages and were completely unhappy with it. We switched to MaxiCom and have never looked back. We are much much happier!

comments.body: Now. Comment Section works in displaying number of comments, can add comments, can reply comments, can edit comments, can delete comments
